verses.verse: וַיַּ֖עַן <WH6030> answered יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Moreover the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> אִיּ֗וֹב <WH347> Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said

הֲ֭רֹב <WH7378> Shall he that contendeth עִם־ <WH5973> with שַׁדַּ֣י <WH7706> with the Almighty יִסּ֑וֹר <WH3250> instruct מוֹכִ֖יחַ <WH3198> [him]? he that reproveth אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> God יַעֲנֶֽנָּה׃ <WH6030> let him answer פ
וַיַּ֖עַן <WH6030> answered אִיּ֥וֹב <WH347> Then Job אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold קַ֭לֹּתִי <WH7043> Behold I am vile מָ֣ה <WH4100> what אֲשִׁיבֶ֑ךָּ <WH7725> what shall I answer יָ֝דִ֗י <WH3027> mine hand שַׂ֣מְתִּי <WH7760> thee? I will lay לְמוֹ־ <WH3926> upon פִֽי׃ <WH6310> my mouth

אַחַ֣ת <WH259> Once דִּ֭בַּרְתִּי <WH1696> have I spoken וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nothing אֶֽעֱנֶ֑ה <WH6030> but I will not answer וּ֝שְׁתַּ֗יִם <WH8147> yea twice וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nothing אוֹסִֽיף׃ <WH3254> but I will proceed no further פ
וַיַּֽעַן־ <WH6030> Then answered יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ אִ֭יּוֹב <WH347> unto Job [מִן כ] [סְעָרָה כ] (מִ֥ן <WH4480> at ק) (סְעָרָ֗ה <WH5591> storm ק) וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said
אֱזָר־ <WH247> Gird up נָ֣א <WH4994> Now כְגֶ֣בֶר <WH1397> now like a man חֲלָצֶ֑יךָ <WH2504> thy loins אֶ֝שְׁאָלְךָ֗ <WH7592> I will demand וְהוֹדִיעֵֽנִי׃ <WH3045> of thee and declare

הַ֭אַף <WH637> really תָּפֵ֣ר <WH6565> Wilt thou also disannul מִשְׁפָּטִ֑י <WH4941> adversary תַּ֝רְשִׁיעֵ֗נִי <WH7561> condemn לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> because of תִּצְדָּֽק׃ <WH6663> me that thou mayest be righteous
וְאִם־ <WH518> Or זְר֖וֹעַ <WH2220> Hast thou an arm כָּאֵ֥ל ׀ <WH410> God לָ֑ךְ וּ֝בְק֗וֹל <WH6963> with a voice כָּמֹ֥הוּ <WH3644> like תַרְעֵֽם׃ <WH7481> thunder

עֲדֵ֥ה <WH5710> Deck נָ֣א <WH4994> with גָֽא֣וֹן <WH1347> thyself now [with] majesty וָגֹ֑בַהּ <WH1363> and excellency וְה֖וֹד <WH1935> thyself with glory וְהָדָ֣ר <WH1926> and beauty תִּלְבָּֽשׁ׃ <WH3847> and array

הָ֭פֵץ <WH6327> Cast abroad עֶבְר֣וֹת <WH5678> the rage אַפֶּ֑ךָ <WH639> of thy wrath וּרְאֵ֥ה <WH7200> and behold כָל־ <WH3605> everyone גֵּ֝אֶ֗ה <WH1343> every one [that is] proud וְהַשְׁפִּילֵֽהוּ׃ <WH8213> and abase

רְאֵ֣ה <WH7200> Look כָל־ <WH3605> everyone גֵּ֭אֶה <WH1343> on every one [that is] proud הַכְנִיעֵ֑הוּ <WH3665> [and] bring him low וַהֲדֹ֖ךְ <WH1915> and tread down רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> the wicked תַּחְתָּֽם׃ <WH8478> where
טָמְנֵ֣ם <WH2934> Hide בֶּעָפָ֣ר <WH6083> them in the dust יָ֑חַד <WH3162> together פְּ֝נֵיהֶ֗ם <WH6440> their faces חֲבֹ֣שׁ <WH2280> [and] bind בַּטָּמֽוּן׃ <WH2934> in secret
וְגַם־ <WH1571> will also אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I אוֹדֶ֑ךָּ <WH3034> Then will I also confess כִּֽי־ <WH3588> can תוֹשִׁ֖עַ <WH3467> can save לְךָ֣ יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <WH3225> unto thee that thine own right hand

הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold נָ֣א <WH4994> now בְ֭הֵמוֹת <WH930> Behold now behemoth אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשִׂ֣יתִי <WH6213> which I made עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> well חָ֝צִ֗יר <WH2682> grass כַּבָּקָ֥ר <WH1241> as an ox יֹאכֵֽל׃ <WH398> with thee he eateth

הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold נָ֣א <WH4994> now כֹח֣וֹ <WH3581> Lo now his strength בְמָתְנָ֑יו <WH4975> [is] in his loins וְ֝אֹנ֗וֹ <WH202> and his force בִּשְׁרִירֵ֥י <WH8306> [is] in the navel בִטְנֽוֹ׃ <WH990> of his belly

יַחְפֹּ֣ץ <WH2654> He moveth זְנָב֣וֹ <WH2180> his tail כְמוֹ־ <WH3644> like אָ֑רֶז <WH730> like a cedar גִּידֵ֖י <WH1517> the sinews [פַחֲדֹו כ] (פַחֲדָ֣יו <WH6344> stone ק) יְשֹׂרָֽגוּ׃ <WH8276> are wrapped together
עֲ֭צָמָיו <WH6106> His bones אֲפִיקֵ֣י <WH650> [are as] strong נְחוּשָׁ֑ה <WH5154> pieces of brass גְּ֝רָמָ֗יו <WH1634> his bones כִּמְטִ֥יל <WH4300> [are] like bars בַּרְזֶֽל׃ <WH1270> of iron
ה֭וּא <WH1931> He רֵאשִׁ֣ית <WH7225> He [is] the chief דַּרְכֵי־ <WH1870> of the ways אֵ֑ל <WH410> of God הָ֝עֹשׂוֹ <WH6213> he that made יַגֵּ֥שׁ <WH5066> to approach חַרְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH2719> his sword

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for ב֭וּל <WH944> food הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> Surely the mountains יִשְׂאוּ־ <WH5375> bring him forth ל֑וֹ וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> and all חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> where all the beasts הַ֝שָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> of the field יְשַֽׂחֲקוּ־ <WH7832> play שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there
תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> Under צֶאֱלִ֥ים <WH6628> under the shady trees יִשְׁכָּ֑ב <WH7901> He lieth בְּסֵ֖תֶר <WH5643> in the covert קָנֶ֣ה <WH7070> of the reed וּבִצָּֽה׃ <WH1207> and fens

יְסֻכֻּ֣הוּ <WH5526> cover צֶאֱלִ֣ים <WH6628> The shady trees צִֽלֲל֑וֹ <WH6752> him [with] their shadow יְ֝סֻבּ֗וּהוּ <WH5437> compass him about עַרְבֵי־ <WH6155> the willows נָֽחַל׃ <WH5158> of the brook

הֵ֤ן <WH2005> If יַעֲשֹׁ֣ק <WH6231> Behold he drinketh up נָ֭הָר <WH5104> a river לֹ֣א <WH3808> is not יַחְפּ֑וֹז <WH2648> [and] hasteth יִבְטַ֓ח ׀ <WH982> not he trusteth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> though יָגִ֖יחַ <WH1518> that he can draw up יַרְדֵּ֣ן <WH3383> Jordan אֶל־ <WH413> to his פִּֽיהוּ׃ <WH6310> into his mouth
בְּעֵינָ֥יו <WH5869> it with his eyes יִקָּחֶ֑נּוּ <WH3947> He taketh בְּ֝מֽוֹקְשִׁ֗ים <WH4170> snares יִנְקָב־ <WH5344> pierceth through אָֽף׃ <WH639> [his] nose
